New Records: CJ McCollum ranks 2nd in scoring average through the first four NBA nights of the 2025 calendar year with 36.0 ppg
Pre-Game Insights: New Orleans is trying to win consecutive games for the first time since Oct. 23 and 25, when it prevailed vs. Chicago and at Portland.
Washington leads New Orleans in the all-time series 24-22, but the Pelicans have won three straight meetings, including a 2-0 sweep last season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jose Alvarado has a ratio of 3.71 in assist-to-turnover ratio this season, which places him behind only Tyrese Haliburton, Tyus Jones, Chris Paul, Immanuel Quickley, and Fred VanVleet.
The Pelicans posted a turnover margin of plus-13 against Washington, which was the club's best margin of the campaign.
Others: Dejounte Murray is questionable due to an elbow injury.
Brandon Ingram, Zion Williamson, and Karlo Matkovic are out due to ankle, hamstring, and back injuries, respectively.
